pkgmetadata.longdescription: Aggregated Functional Data Calibration using Splines and Wavelets // Implements methods for calibrating an aggregated functional data model using wavelets or splines. Each aggregated curve is modeled as a linear combination of component functions and known weights. The component functions are estimated using wavelets or splines. The package is based on dos Santos Sousa (2024) doi:10.1515/mcma-2023-2016 and Saraiva and Dias (2009) doi:10.47749/T/UNICAMP.2009.471073.
